Interface UserDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<User>

    public interface UserDao
extends Dao<User>
    Provides additional operations for user-interaction with db.

    Author:
    Alexey Kardychko

        password - user's password.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
